verses.1: Nipi ni zingsang tungin numeite in a bawl sa uh paknamtui tawi-in hanah va pai uh hi.

verses.19: Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Bang thu ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin amaute in, “Nazareth khuami Jesu tunga thupiang ahi hi. Amah pen kamsang khat hi a, Pasian le mite khempeuh in a thugen le a nasepna ah vang a nei mahmah khatin a ngaihsut uh ahi hi.

verses.24: Tua ciangin ka lawmte uh pawl khat zong hanah va pai uh a, numeiteʼ gen bang teekteekin va mu uh a, ahi zongin Jesu mu lo uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.25: Tua ciangin Jesu in amau tegel kiangah, “Bangzah takin hai a, bang dingin kamsangteʼ thugen um thei lo na hi uh hiam?

verses.39: Ka khut le ka khete en un; kei mahmah ka hi hi. Hong lawng unla hong thei un. Tu-a keima neih bangin sikha in pum le tak nei ahi hiam?” a cih khit ciangin
